sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Good morning, Europe. It's Tuesday the 26th of April. I'm Raoul San. It's great to have you with us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Let's take a look at our top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Billionaire Elon Musk vows to unlock the free speech potential of Twitter after reaching a deal to buy the social media network for more than 41 billion euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov issues a warning to the West.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Don't underestimate the real danger of World War III.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And UN Chief Antonio Guterres begins a three-day trip to Russia and Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He's scheduled to meet President Putin later today in Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Billionaire Elon Musk has acquired Twitter for approximately 41 billion euros. The Tesla CEO says he wanted to buy the social media giant because he believed it didn't live up to its potential as a platform for free speech. In a tweet the world's richest man said I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter because that is what free speech means. The move comes as Twitter faces growing pressure from politicians and regulators over its efforts to mediate misinformation. Last year former US President Donald Trump was permanently suspended from his account for repeatedly violating Twitter's rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The White House has declined to comment on the takeover, but spokesperson Jen Psaki told reporters that social media companies cannot provide a platform for hate speech and fake news.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: No matter who owns or runs Twitter, the president has long been concerned about the power of large social media platforms, the power they have over our everyday lives, has long argued that tech platforms must be held accountable for the harms they cause.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Some users fear that the entrepreneur will seek to control content on the platform for his own purposes, while others have welcomed the news.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A stark warning from Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov. There is a real danger of a

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: third world war. In an interview on Russian state television, Lavrov said peace talks between Moscow and Kyiv will continue, but he accused Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky of only pretending to negotiate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Many of us are convinced that Ukraine's real position is determined in Washington, London and other Western capitals. And therefore, our political analysts say, why talk with President Volodymyr Zelensky's team? We need to talk with the Americans, negotiate with them, reach some kind of agreement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: We still continue to negotiate with the team that Zelensky put forward.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: These contacts will continue, but as for the Americans, it would be probably useful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But any manifestations of interest on their part regarding contacts on Ukraine or other issues, we do not observe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kyiv for its part says Moscow chose war instead of talks when it hit several cities with missiles over the weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky said Russia would not be able to win the war against his country and called on residents to do everything to make the presence of Russian troops in Ukraine unbearable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Everyone in the world, even those who openly did not support us, now agree that it is in Ukraine that the fate of Europe, the fate of global security and the fate of the democratic system is decided.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As the war escalates in the east, Russia appears focused on destroying Ukrainian infrastructure and disrupting military supply routes from foreign countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Russians are somehow chaotically shelling the whole village.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We do not see the logic of these bombings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: One time they fire on the railway, another time they fire on some industrial facilities, next day on residential areas." On Monday, the Russian military admitted having destroyed six facilities powering railways in several regions using precise guided weapons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukraine had accused Russia of striking multiple railway stations in the center and west of the country, killing at least five people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's foreign minister is calling on the United Nations to broker a deal with Russia AMNA NAWAZ. UKRAINE'S FOREIGN MINISTER IS CALLING ON THE UNITED NATIONS TO BROKER A DEAL WITH RUSSIA TO EVACUATE MARIUPOL RESIDENTS.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: BUT HE ALSO WARNS THE U.N. SECRETARY-GENERAL NOT TO FALL INTO WHAT HE CALLS THE KREMLIN'S DIPLOMATIC TRAP.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: ANTONIO GUTERRES IS SCHEDULED TO VISIT BOTH RUSSIA AND UKRAINE THIS WEEK, AND HIS DECISION TO MEET RUSSIAN PRESIDENT VLADIMIR PUTIN BEFORE VISITING KYIV HAS NOT PLEASED UKRAINE. both Russia and Ukraine this week. And his decision to meet Russian President Vladimir Putin before visiting Kyiv has not pleased Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: VLADIMIR PUTIN, Russian President of Ukraine, It has been a long diplomatic tradition that one has to visit Kyiv before going to Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And this is not kind of a huge disappointment that we cannot live with. First, it's a trap kind of a huge disappointment that we cannot live with. First, it's a trap for him, diplomatic trap.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And second, they may be ready to discuss something with him. And our request to him is, instead of focusing on broad issues like full and comprehensive ceasefire, which is important, but we see what Russia does on the battleground. It's simply not feasible. He should focus primarily on one issue, evocation of Marines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: ALI ROGIN, Russian President- Russia claimed on Monday that it reached an agreement with Kyiv to open humanitarian corridors in Maropol, so it can evacuate the Azovstal plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukraine has denied that an agreement was reached and has since denounced airstrikes corridors in Maripol so it can evacuate the Azovstal plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukraine has denied that an agreement was reached and has since denounced airstrikes on the steel plant, where both fighters and civilians are sheltering.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The port city has been under siege since the start of Russia's invasion. The United Nations Secretary General Antonio Guterres is today meeting Vladimir Putin in

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Mr. Guterres' associate spokesman said that the goal is to discuss what could be done urgently to bring peace to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some analysts say that Mr. Guterres could bring up the question of the role of the un in the peace talks as well as pressing for humanitarian access and urgent aid to evacuate civilians from mariupol the kremlin has not provided any details of the upcoming talks but there was a short statement from the russian foreign ministry as mr guterres will also meet with sergey lavrov today the statement says quote the focus will be on the crisis situation in ukraine which has developed as a result of the eight year conflict unleashed by kiev against the population of Donbass. Many analysts believe that the talks in Moscow are going to be quite difficult and say that there is little hope for any breakthrough.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Thursday, Antonio Guterres will also meet with the president of Ukraine in Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Zelensky has criticized his decision to visit Moscow first saying that it was simply wrong. Galina Polonskaya, Euronews from Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The director general for the UN's nuclear watchdog Rafael Grossi is traveling to the Chernobyl power plant in Ukraine with a team of experts to address concerns over the site's radiation levels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This follows weeks of uncertainty after Russian forces withdrew from the area in March.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Johannes Ple≈°berger has more from Vienna.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The nuclear power plants in Ukraine continue to pose a major security risk, especially for Central and Eastern Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This is why the head of the International Atomic Energy Agency, Rafael Grossi, is now once again traveling to the war-torn country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Namely to Chernobyl.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The situation at the radioactive accident site is still difficult, according to Kyiv, partly because of damaged bridges and landmine removal work.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ukraine had previously requested the delivery of urgently needed equipment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: We are talking about radiation measuring devices, protective suits or diesel generators.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Such generators already had to be used in Chernobyl in March after the normal power supply was cut off during the Russian occupation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: However, it remains to be seen whether Grossi and his team managed to restore the data surveillance transmission from the radioactive site to the agency headquarters here in Vienna. During his stay, Grossi also wants to personally thank the Chernobyl staff, which had to work non-stop for several weeks under the most difficult circumstances. The real cause for concern, however however continues to be the Ukraine's 14 active nuclear reactors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: If they were to be damaged in the ongoing fighting, the consequences would be catastrophic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Grossi has therefore announced further visits in the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Johannes Blechberger, Euronews, Vienna. NOW.
